ghostPage.title: Members-Only Work Content
ghostPage.custom_excerpt:
This is a page demonstrating Members Only content feature implemented from Ghost 3.0 update.. 

It also includes a video demo with sample content of the AI pipeline and auto-content generation.
ghostPage.meta_description: Generate new subscribers, readers, and revenue with AI generated content based on your already existing knowledge.
